text: Simple Quadriflow Implementation.  Any Questions, recommendations or bugs, email Oliver Hotz @ oliver@heimlich.net.
Quadriflow takes a manifold mesh and generates a manifold quad mesh.  The Face number increases linearly with the resolution controlled by the user.
Resolution is the desired number of faces in the quad mesh.
By default, quadriflow does not explicitly detect and perserve the sharp edges in the model.  This option enables the detection.
By default, quadriflow uses the Boykov maximum flow solver from boost becuase it is faster.  You can enable the adaptive network simplexe minimum-cost flow solver with this option.
Prints out Debugging information such as Quadriflow output and Timestamps.

title: OD QuadriFlow
summary: Simple Quadriflow Implementation.  Any Questions, recommendations or bugs, email Oliver Hotz @ oliver@heimlich.net.
